io.leonis.zosma.game.data

Interface Referee

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, io.leonis.algieba.Temporal
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Referee.State

    public interface Referee
extends io.leonis.algieba.Temporal, java.io.Serializable
    The Class RefereeState. This class represents the state of a Small Size League referee object, based on RoboCup-SSL/ssl-refbox
